reviews.review_msg: Emily O'Brien is one of the best teachers I have had at SFU. She really engages the class and inspires enthusiasm in her class. She really knows her subject matter and is able to make everything interesting. One book required but it's cheap and also very interesting. Mandatory attendance at the tutorial but you won't want to miss it anyways!

This prof definitely is very intelligent and interested in the material, but is a ruthless marker. no notes, just lectures of 3 hours straight returns essays with so much critique and writing it is insane. makes you feel quite unintelligent. i do not recommend taking a class with her unless u are HIGHLY interested in the material. Very hard marker

nice & friendly prof, too much work, marks too hard, too much readings, i thought this course would be interesting and not too much work, but it turns out to be super crazy HARD and difficult. impossible to score a good grade on essay or midterms or final. wayyyy too muchh work and essays, it's crazy!
